posts.post_title: T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest PSA 4
posts.post_content:
PSA 4 T206 Johnson, hands at chest.  Sweet Cap back.  Clean image, clean back.
$775, insured shipping included. 
First to email and say I'll take it, gets it!

Thanks, Josh
